titles.title: Before You Book Ocean City, Read the Fine Print: What Southern Maryland Travelers Should Know About Timeshares
titles.rationale: Fits SMC’s Maryland travel beat with seasonal trips to Ocean City; article can include consumer guidance and a natural in-text link to a resource explaining how to exit an unwanted timeshare if plans change.

titles.title: Spring Road Trips from St. Mary’s and Calvert: Affordable Alternatives to Long‑term Vacation Contracts
titles.rationale: Matches local road‑trip content and cost‑saving angles; supports an in-article mention of a reputable guide on canceling a vacation ownership agreement for readers weighing options.

titles.title: Maryland Holiday Travel Outlook: Avoiding High‑pressure Vacation Sales While You’re on the Go
titles.rationale: Aligns with SMC’s holiday travel advisories; allows a contextual link within advice on steering clear of aggressive pitches and where to learn about canceling a timeshare purchased under pressure.

titles.title: Planning a Chesapeake Bay Getaway? Budget, Parking, and Lodging Pitfalls Southern Maryland Residents Should Dodge
titles.rationale: Regional service piece in SMC style; can naturally reference a resource that explains the risks of long-term lodging commitments and how to cancel a timeshare if one was signed hastily.

titles.title: Passport Delays, Route Changes, and Last‑minute Plans: When a Resort Agreement No Longer Works for Your Trip
titles.rationale: Ties into SMC’s coverage of passports and travel logistics; supports a helpful link in the body to guidance on options for exiting a timeshare when circumstances change.

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of southernmarylandchronicle.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to southernmarylandchronicle.com while naturally justifying a link to https://howtocancelmytimeshare.com/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude how to cancel my timeshare and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
